newsArray.title: Soccer-Italian Ranieri retires after 37 years in management
newsArray.description: (Reuters) -Claudio Ranieri, who famously led Leicester City to a shock Premier League title in 2016, has announced his retirement from football at the age of 72. Read full story

newsArray.title: Pourquoi il y aura un carton rose lors de la prochaine Copa America
newsArray.description: La Confédération sud-américain de football (Conmebol) a annoncé la mise en place d'un carton rose lors de la prochaine Copa America (20 juin au 14 juillet). Celui-ci permettra aux entraîneurs de remplacer un joueur suspecté de commotion cérébrale.

newsArray.title: Fiorentina coach Italiano delighted edging Cagliari in 5-goal thriller: I'm happy
creator: Carlos Volcano, Tribal Football
newsArray.description: Fiorentina coach Vincenzo Italiano was left delighted with their 3-2 win at Cagliari last night. An injury-time penalty - on 103 minutes - converted by Arthur Melo saw Fiorentina triumph and move into eighth place.

newsArray.title: President Federation Cup round of 16 to begin May 29 – NFF
creator: Prompt News
newsArray.description: Women football teams in Nigeria will do battle at the 2024 President Federation Cup beginning with the Round of 16 matches from May 29. A statement by Ruth David, Nigeria Footbal Federation (NFF) Director ofl Competitions, on Thursday said eight matches would be played across eight centres. The centres are Enugu, Akure, Benin City, Asaba,Ikenne,Aba, [...]The post President Federation Cup round of 16 to begin May 29 – NFF first appeared on Prompt News.
